sections.heading: a civil contract.In law, marriage is considered a civil contract, to which the consent of the parties capable of contracting is essential
sections.text: SourceR.S.1866, c. 34, § 1, p. 254;R.S.1913, § 1540;C.S.1922, § 1489;C.S.1929, § 42-101;R.S.1943, § 42-101.Cross ReferencesAgreements based on consideration of ma
